name: ELEC FAIL

procedure.text:
+'WARNING WARNING' voice Warning
Double DC Generator failure.
1. Pilot utility light — ON (for night operations).
2. GEN 1 & 2 switches — Select RESET and confirm ON.
If warning clears: Both generators back on line. Continue flight.
If 1(2) DC GEN FAIL illuminates: Carry out SINGLE DC GENERATOR FAILURE procedure. See page 107.
If ELEC FAIL remains: Confirm GEN BUS Switch (EDCU ELEC page) AUTO.
Loss of all MAIN BUS and all NON ESS BUS. See Notes 1 and 2.
Select VHF 1 on right side to ensure continue radio communication.
Carry out LANDING GEAR EMERGENCY DOWN PROCEDURE. See page 52.
Battery power is available for maximum 30 minutes.

notes: See page 15 for services lost when BUS not available.

If MAIN BUS 1 required, on EDCU ELEC page, set GEN BUS switch to OVRD to supply battery power to MAIN BUS 1 reducing the battery endurance. If BUS TIE is switched OVRD the battery power is also supplied to MAIN BUS 2, with a further reduction in battery endurance.
